name: King Of Meme
description: The King of all Meme Coin $LION wants to overcome the limitations of existing DogeShibaInuPepeBabyDogeBone coins. While these coins have achieved remarkable success, they still face certain constraints that we, at Lion, are determined to improve upon! $LION is here to fix the past and pounce into the future. Why settle for snooze-worthy meme coins when you can blast off with Lion?
